contenttransfer:
Special page name for the [[Special:ContentTransfer]] special page.
{{Identical|Content transfer}}
contenttransfer-text-filter-input-label:
Short label for the page name input field.
{{Identical|Page name}}
contenttransfer-namespace-filter-input-l:
Short label for the namespace input field.
{{Identical|Namespace}}
contenttransfer-category-filter-input-la:
Short label for the category input field.
{{Identical|Category}}
contenttransfer-pages-header:
Section headline for the pages about to be transfered.
{{Identical|Pages to be transfered}}
contenttransfer-pages-header-count:
Info text of how many pages have been selected to be about to be transfered.
* $1 - Total amount of available pages
* $2 - Number of selected pages
contenttransfer-push-pages-button-label:
Short Label for button that starts the process of transfering pages.
{{Identical|Transfer}}
contenttransfer-dialog-push-title:
Headline for the dialog, that transfers a page.
{{Identical|Transfer content}}
contenttransfer-dialog-push-action-do-pu:
Short Label for button that starts the process of transfering page.
{{Identical|Transfer}}
contenttransfer-dialog-push-action-cance:
Short Label for button that cancels the process of transfering page.
{{Identical|Cancel}}
contenttransfer-dialog-push-action-done-:
Short Label for button that closes the transfer page dialog.
{{Identical|Done}}
contenttransfer-dialog-push-preview-layo:
Headline for preview stage in process dialog for the page transfer.
{{Identical|Page overview}}
contenttransfer-dialog-push-progress-lay:
Headline for progress stage in process dialog for the page transfer.
{{Identical|Progress}}
contenttransfer-dialog-push-report-layou:
Headline for report stage in process dialog for the page transfer.
{{Identical|Report}}
contenttransfer-dialog-push-preview-page:
Section headline of the list of pages, that will be transfered.
* $1 - Number of pages

Section headline of the list of files, that will be transfered.
* $1 - Number of files

Section headline of the list of categories, that will be transfered.
* $1 - Number of categories

Section headline of the list of templates, that will be transfered.
* $1 - Number of templates
contenttransfer-progress-current-operati:
Info text that shows what page is transfering at the moment
* $1 - Name of the page that is transfering
contenttransfer-report-success-count:
Info text that shows how many pages of an amout of total available have been transfered.
* $1 - Number of transfered pages
* $2 - Total amount of availabe pages
contenttransfer-report-failure:
Info text that shows the error, whenever a page could not be transfered
.* $1 - The reason why the page could not be transfered
contenttransfer-target-picker-label:
Label for target selection input
{{Identical|Transfer target}}
contenttransfer-progress-push-target-lab:
Info text, that shows the target, the page will be translfered to.
* $1 - Name of the target
contenttransfer-invalid-target: Error message, when the selected target is invalid
contenttransfer-no-pageprops: Error message, when the pages properties cannot be retrieved
contenttransfer-no-login-token: Error message, when the login token cannot be retrieved
contenttransfer-authentication-failed: Error message, when the authentication failed
contenttransfer-cannot-create: Error message, when the page cannot be created
contenttransfer-namespace-not-found:
Error message, when the namespace was not found on the receiving wiki.
* $1 - Name of the namespace, that is not present in the retrieving wiki
contenttransfer-report-interrupted:
Info text for when the transfer was interupted.
* $1 Number of pages already transfered
contenttransfer-no-csrf-token: Error message when no csrf token could be retrieved
contenttransfer-edit-fail: Error message, when the page cannot be edited on receiving wiki
contenttransfer-edit-fail-message:
Error message when there was an error while saving the page
* $1 - Error, that occoured while saving the page
contenttransfer-upload-fail: File cannot be uploaded to receiving wiki
contenttransfer-upload-fail-message:
Error message when the upload of a file failed
* $1 - Error, that occoured while uploading
contenttransfer-progress-purge-pages: Info text while pages on target wiki get purged
contenttransfer-page-protected: Error message when the page is protected in the retreiving wiki
contenttransfer-only-modified-label: Label for checkbox input, that defines if only modified pages since last transfer will be transfered when checked
contenttransfer-only-modified-help: Help text for checkbox input, that defines if only modified pages since last transfer will be transfered when checked. Should inform, that this will also affect related pages.
contenttransfer-no-pages-label: Error message, when there are no pages available
contenttransfer-dialog-preview-target-in:
Info text, into what target the page will be transfered to.
* $1 - Name of the target, the page will be transfered to
contenttransfer-dialog-preview-target-dr: Info text, when the page is transfered into the draft namespace on the target
contenttransfer-too-many-pages-warning:
Info text when there is more pages about to be transfered than allowed by configuration. Pages over this limit will not be transfered.
* $1 - Number of pages from the selection, that will be transfered.
* $2 - Number of configured limit, that is allowed per push
contenttransfer-generic-error: Generic error message, when there was an error
contenttransfer-include-related: Label for the checkbox input, that defines if resources such as categories, templates and files will be transfered
contenttransfer-modified-since-label:
Label for the modified since date text input field.
{{Identical|Modified since}}
contenttransfer-modified-since-ph:
Placeholder text for the modified since date text input. Shows the format in what the date must be provided. DD.MM.YYYY
{{notranslate}}
contenttransfer-dialog-push-preview-page:
Section headline of the list of pages, that will be transfered.
* $1 - Number of pages
content-transfer-push-related-pages: Section title for list of related pages
contenttransfer-dialog-push-subgroup-lab: Section title for pages that are referenced in selected pages
Section title for pages that are transcluded to selected pages
